verses.name: Jeremiah 31:37
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord; If heaven above can be measured, and the foundations of the earth searched out beneath, I will also cast off all the seed of Israel for all that they have done, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:38
verses.text: Behold, the days come, saith the Lord, that the city shall be built to the Lord from the tower of Hananeel unto the gate of the corner.

verses.name: Jeremiah 31:39
verses.text: And the measuring line shall yet go forth over against it upon the hill Gareb, and shall compass about to Goath.
